text: If we want to end #COVID19, there can't be any taboos. To increase #vaccine production worldwide, I'm calling for the #TRIPS Waiver (among various other measures) with my colleague @pfmajorino& over 250🇪🇺and national MPs. #EUCO must make way for open access to patents. Our Call⬇️ https://t.co/1tgFQ1mNHk
